  Spellcrafter is an RPG game with deep tactical turn-based combat and
  a unique spell casting system. Explore the magical world, collect gold,
  interact with NPCs, take quests and make moral choices! Recruit heroes,
  assemble and summon powerful troops and send them into battle!
